OrgName.entry: FUN LANGUAGES - LE CLUB FRANCAIS AND EL CLUB ESPANOL

Desc.entry: Provides a progressive French and Spanish learning programme through play, activity and songs. Aims to increase a child's self confidence and foster a broad outlook on life through learning to speak a second language. Caters for children aged 2-12 years. Also provides French tuition for adults and GCSE and A level students.
